data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Zambezi that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zambezi, Namibia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Zambezi, Namibia so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 21 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Zambezi, Namibia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Zambezi, Namibia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 79,300 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Zambezi.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Zambezi, Namibia.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Zambezi, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zambezi, Namibia has a population of 90,600.

We estimate Zambezi has 11,300 people who might know Jesus, 69,139 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 10,161 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Zambezi. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.
